feed.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [GRA, RBX, SBG, BHS / France, Canada][ Cisco ASA firewall] – Baremetal – Cisco ASA firewall – Planned Service End of Life
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 31, 10:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 6, 12:21 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : As part of the product lifecycle management we plan to end the baremetal service of Cisco ASA firewall by August 31, 2022. This service interruption will concern only the customers who have previously subscribed to this service.
OVHcloud will decommission the service so that you won’t be able to connect to your Cisco ASA firewall from that date.
Please make the appropriate backup of your data prior that date.
---------------------------------------------------
Heure de début : 28/02/2022 10:00 UTC
Impact du service : Dans le cadre de la gestion du cycle de vie des produits, nous prévoyons de mettre fin au service baremetal du pare-feu Cisco ASA au 31 aout 2022. Cette interruption de service ne concernera que les clients qui ont précédemment souscrit à ce service.
OVHcloud mettra le service hors service de sorte que vous ne pourrez plus vous connecter à votre pare-feu Cisco ASA à partir de cette date.
Veuillez effectuer les sauvegardes appropriées de vos données avant cette date.

entry.title: [LIM3][Dedicated Servers] - LIM0313B01B
entry.content:
Mar 13, 09:30 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 13/03/2022 09:34 UTC
End Time : 13/03/2022 10:07 UTC
Service impact : Following a leak, all rack LIM0313B01B has been shutdown to prevent more damage.
Root cause : Water leak in our cooling system.

entry.title: [GRA2][Dedicated servers] - G264B12
entry.content:
Mar 12, 12:00 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 12/03/2022 07:16 UTC
End Time : 12/03/2022 11:54 UTC
Root cause : The incident was caused by a leak in the cooling system of the rack.

Mar 12, 09:43 UTC
Update - 1 servers are available again.
A second server is being restarted, and the last server is still in the hands of our technicians to be put back into service as soon as possible.

We will get back to you as soon as possible.

Mar 12, 07:47 UTC
Identified - Start time : 12/03/2022 07:16 UTC
Service impact : 3 servers down on rack G264B12.
Root cause : The incident was caused by a leak in the cooling system of the rack.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are currently replacing the damaged hardware.

entry.title: [BHS1][Dedicated Servers] - T01C19
entry.content:
Mar 11, 08:41 UTC
Resolved - All servers in the T01C19 rack are functional

Start Time : 11/03/2022 07:14 UTC
End Time : 11/03/2022 08:40 UTC
Root cause : The switch connected to the rack had a hardware failure

Mar 11, 08:01 UTC

Ongoing actions : Our teams proceed to the replacement of the equipment
Time to resolution : We estimate the time to replace the switch at 45 minutes

Mar 11, 07:26 UTC
